entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 11:55AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Widely Scattered Strong Thunderstorms Possible Through This Evening... Isolated to widely scattered thunderstorms, some strong, will be possible through early evening across the southern Interior and higher elevation inland mountains. Frequent lightning, strong and gusty winds, and small hail with heavy downpours are all possible.
